  <style id="wp-custom-css" type="text/css">
   .apester-element {
	width: auto!important;
}

.review-specs .review-specs__table {
	display: block!important;
}

/* DO NOT REMOVE ANYTHING BELOW HERE WITHOUT ASKING JOHN HUDSON */

.home.has-adverts,
.page.has-adverts{
	margin-top: 0!important;
}

.post-main strong {
	font-size: 1.15em;
}

@media (max-width: 45.49em) {
	.header .logo img {
		max-width: 140px;
	}
}

/* ----- HERO ----- */
.home .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed,
.page .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed {
	margin: 0;
	overflow: hidden;
	padding: 0;
}

.home .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .s-container__inner,
.page .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .s-container__inner {
	max-width: 100%;
}

.home .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .widgettitle,
.page .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .widgettitle {
	display: block;
    margin: 45px auto 30px;
    max-width: 1440px;
}

.home .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item,
.page .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item {
	padding: 0.5px;
	text-align: left;
  margin-bottom: 0!important;
}

.home .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item:after,
.page .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item:after {
	content: "";
	display: table;
	clear: both;
}

.home .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item .entry-content,
.page .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item .entry-content {
	display: block;
	padding: 30px 30px 65px 30px;
}

.home .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item:first-child .entry-content,
.page .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item:first-child .entry-content {
	background: rgb(82,21,120);
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(left,  rgba(82,21,120,0.8) 0%, rgba(33,109,181,0.8) 100%);
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left,  rgba(82,21,120,0.8) 0%,rgba(33,109,181,0.8) 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(to right,  rgba(82,21,120,0.8) 0%,rgba(33,109,181,0.8) 100%);
	border-radius: 5px 0 0 0;
	height: auto;
	left: unset;
    max-width: 720px;
    right: 0;
}

.home .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item:last-child .entry-content,
.page .listing--hero.s-container--fullbleed .listing-item:last-child .entry-content {
	background: rgb(229,42,24);
